description: Email templates for factors service.  The email template file contains a sender, subject, and contents section for customization.  Macros are replaced in the email before it is sent.  Macros are described below and must start and end with @ sign.

required.description: The recovery link that is emailed to the end user. The macro is used by the email_password_recovery.xml template.
The email address of the sender. The macro is used by the email_password_recovery.xml template.
The tenant name. The macro is used by all of the email templates.
The user name. The macro is used by the email_password_recovery.xml template.
The user name. The macro is used by the email_password_recovery.xml template.
